metadata.title: CVE-2016-3766 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: MPEG4Extractor.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-07-01does not check whether memory allocation succeeds, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via acrafted file, aka internal bug 28471206.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
